name: Canva
description: Canva offers a free AI logo maker with an intuitive drag-and-drop interface, extensive template library, and collaborative features for beginners. Logos can be downloaded in various formats, though some premium fonts and graphics may require payment.

name: Namecheap Logo Maker
description: Namecheap provides a free AI logo maker ideal for basic logo creation with pre-designed icons and text. No hidden costs for designing and downloading logos, though account signup is required for downloads.

name: FreeLogoDesign
description: FreeLogoDesign allows users to create and modify logos for free with a user-friendly interface. No payment is required to use the tool or download logos, and it supports unlimited edits.

name: Renderforest Logo Maker
description: Renderforest offers a free logo maker with a wide range of templates. Users can customize and download logos in standard resolution at no cost, with paid options for higher resolutions.

name: DesignMantic
description: DesignMantic provides a free AI-powered logo design tool with click-based editing for fonts, colors, and shapes. Logos can be created for free, though downloading high-resolution files requires payment.

name: Design Free Logo Online
description: Design Free Logo Online offers a free AI logo generator with customizable templates. Users can create and download logos for free, with professional formats available without additional cost.

name: Logomakr
description: Logomakr provides a free AI-powered logo generator with thousands of clipart and font options. Users can create and customize logos for free, with payment required only for vector file downloads.
